Entities of the higher Universes descended upon Earth, and great bat- tles of pure energy were fought in Earth's local galaxy and within Earth's atmosphere. These events became known as the Electric Wars. The wars lasted around 900 years as Entities of these opposing groups battled for con- trol over Earth's natural portal system and the Sphere of Amenti.
